Liono: Key can we continue this later  ::Goes on loud speaker:: OK LET ME 
CLEAR SOMETHING UP TO ALL THE MAXIMALS NOBODY IS FORCING YOU TO STAY IN MY 
BASE YOU CAN LEAVE whenever YOUR READY. BUT FROM ON OUT SHUT UP AND DEAL WITH 
IT FOR NO BOT WALKS INTO ANOTHER BOTS HOME AND DISRESPECTS HIM. AND I'M NOT 
GOING TO BEG ANYONE TO STAY SO ANYBODY THAT DOESN'T WANT TO FOLLOW MY COMMAND 
IS WELCOME TO LEAVE. AT ANYTIME ((SO CODE IF YOUR SO UNHAPPY THE DOOR IS OPEN 
NOW TAKE YOUR LEAVE)) I'D RATHER FACE HELLBEAST ALONE THAN HERE YOU ALL WHINE 
EVERYDAY SO LEAVE IF ITS THAT BAD. BUT TO THOSE OF YOU THAT HAVE HELP ME OUT 
OF SOME TIGHT SPOTS IN THE PAST KEY, PROWL, RAMULAS, BLUE, TOCAR, SNIPER AND 
MANY WHO I CAN'T LIST RIGHT NOW THANK YOU AND IF YOU CHOOSE TO LEAVE YOU CAN 
ALWAYS COME HERE AND HEAL.  

::goes to his quarters and sit in the Cr chamber::
